title: Count Basie - 1982 - Kansas City 6 FLAC
description:
Count Basie - 1982 - Kansas City 6

This is one of many small-group jam sessions organized by Norman Granz to feature pianist Count Basie. This time around the proceedings (utilizing a sextet) have plenty of solo space for trumpeter Willie Cook, altoist Eddie "Cleanhead" Vinson (who also takes a vocal) and guitairist Joe Pass. As usual, when Basie had his way, the emphasis is on the blues and the music always swings. (AllMusic)

Track list:
01 - Walking the blues
02 - Blues for little Jazz
03 - Vegas Drag
04 - Wee Baby
05 - Scooter
06 - St. Louis blues
07 - Opus Six

Personnel:
Count Basie - piano
Eddie Vinson - alto saxophone
Willie Cook - trumpet
Joe Pass - guitar
